title: 'Tis the Season
content: To take that crunched credit just as far as it will go! If you’re in need of gift ideas, I’ve posted several on [my blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20090627065716/http:/www.pilcrowtype.com/blog/archives/tag/gifts). Everything but the Etsy stuff should still be available, I believe...
author: paul d hunt
